intro: Psychotria kirkii var. tarambassica, commonly known as the Tarambassica Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo and the Central African Republic. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It often grows in moist, shaded environments such as under forest canopies. The plant is notable for its chemical composition, which includes various alkaloids, though it is not as well-studied as other Psychotria species.
